channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ScottHansonDE.

item.description: @JorgeOrtega Back then leaning German was easier. There was no Internet and I knew no-one with whom I could speak English!
item.source:markdown: @JorgeOrtega Back then leaning German was easier. There was no Internet and I knew no-one with whom I could speak English!

item.description: Helping our son move for the fourth time since he started college, this time from downtown Harburg to a quieter part of Harburg
item.source:markdown: Helping our son move for the fourth time since he started college, this time from downtown Harburg to a quieter part of Harburg

item.description: @oaeblog @RealMarkDziak Our main criterion when choosing a name for our son was that it sounded the same in German and in English #Christopher
